programme.title: Awas Tercyduk Ep7
programme.desc: Awas Tercyduk, sebuah program realiti televisyen, mendedahkan kejadian yang tidak dijangka dalam kehidupan seharian kita.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep45
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman’s three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Eungyo
programme.desc: Renowned old poet Jeokyo 's relationship with his son-like student Jiwoo starts to crack when a 17-year-old girl Eungyo steps in.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the case, only to uncover a government conspiracy that is bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped…

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: Recipe for Farewell Ep10
programme.desc: A heart-touching kitchen diary of a husband who doesn’t know how to cook but prepares a table for his wife who was diagnosed with terminal cancer after they separated.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep9
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: CAMP ZEROBASEONE Ep3
programme.desc: A camping reality show in which the nine members get on a special edition camping car to go on a trip. Starting from “zero,” the members make their camping trip by completing mysterious missions.

programme.title: Sixth Sense 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Yoo Jae-suk and his fellow cast members return for the 3rd season! They will visit different places or people, and use their 'sixth sense' to analyze and figure out which one is entirely fabricated.

programme.title: Love Catcher in Seoul Ep5
programme.desc: <Love Catcher in Seoul> is a dating psychological game played by 'love catchers' who participate for searching true love and 'money catchers' who only aim for money.

programme.title: Go Go With Mr. Paik Ep3
programme.desc: Korean star chef Paik Jong-won, together with Onew, Jung Chae-yeon, Lee Seung-hoon and Gong Seung-yeon are travelling to Malaysia, Thailand and Singapore, enjoying their holiday as well as exploring local markets for exotic ingredients to cook their meals

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai Ep1
programme.desc: Top celebrities come together to play a real-life “Blue Marble” game in Dubai with unexpected challenges! Who will survive in crisis and seize both friendship and money as the ultimate winning bro?

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep10
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Earth Arcade Ep1
programme.desc: Na PD is coming back with a new multiverse action adventure variety! Follow the four female warriors to Thailand who set out to capture the rabbit which has escaped from the moon and landed on earth.

programme.title: Wok The World Ep5
programme.desc: "Demon Chef" Alvin Leung and his students are travelling to different countries to explore various local Chinese cuisines.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim Ep14

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep7172
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46634664
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1831
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3642
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2065
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep164
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth’s surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: International Falls

programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the second leg of his four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling from Cyprus, across the sea to Lebanon and on to Israel and the Gaza Strip.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: Serengeti S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Kinship - The drama now centres around the river where enchanting new characters, such as an adorable baby hippo, meet old favourites. Bonds of kinship are tested as adventures continue.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Georgia and Azerbaijan - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, across the rapidly changing post-Soviet states of Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sun: God Star - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience – the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience – the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1

From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Colors & Patterns - Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Ones - Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Usana the Cheetah Cub - Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, she’s got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asia’s two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane – a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3

programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the “underwater movie capital of the world”. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Power - Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ugly - Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Chico the Baby Capuchin - In Brazil’s Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Buck's Life - Follow several different males as they roam the land, climb up the social ladder, and fight for their mating rights in Eastern Grey colony. For these bucks, the drive to perpetuate their species promises a life full of risk and reward.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Procida - Gino visits Procida and meets two women who are making a mark on the culinary landscape of a tiny island that has a big reputation when it comes to food.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Southwick and Southport - Duncan and Josie attempt to transform their 18th-century barn into a liveable family home. And can Jenny restore a Victorian gothic pile in Southport to its former glory?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle's Horse Cart - In the ancient Forest of Dean, expert treehouse-builder Simon Parfett meets Jon and Michelle. Jon runs a forest retreat and has had the idea to turn an old horse cart into unique accommodation for his guests.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Smith family embark upon a mammoth declutter. Stacey and the team challenge them to let go of half of their possessions, so that they can beautifully reorganise their life and home.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venice - Chef Angela Hartnett takes Fred to Venice to enjoy the simple but stunning food at her favourite restaurant and to experience unforgettable service at Italy's oldest cafe.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep5
programme.desc: Heat three sees four professional chefs challenged to prepare agnolotti with a pea and mint pesto and pan-fried calves liver with walnut beurre noisette.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep6
programme.desc: Heat three continues as the contenders cook their Signature Dishes. The two most impressive chefs will go through to the quarter-final.

programme.desc: Southwick and Southport - Duncan and Josie attempt to transform their 18th-century barn into a liveable family home. And can Jenny restore a Victorian gothic pile in Southport to its former glory?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Claire's Pop Up Tent - Simon and the team are in an area of outstanding natural beauty, the Blackdown Hills, to help theatrical prop maker Clare with a truly unique project. She has big plans to turn a 1960's trailer tent into funky festival themed accommodation.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie shares more fabulous one-pan dishes: foolproof tray-baked salmon in a bag; super-easy tomato fritters that you can rattle out in a frying pan; and roasted rolled pork and a risotto that are BOTH cooked in the same casserole pan. Result!

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Wow Factor - Rachel serves up a chocolate-lover's ice cream dream, makes chocolate bread, and visits London to sample chocolate from around the world.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep7
programme.desc: In heat four, the Skills Test involves eggs benedict and a strawberry dessert. Then each of the four chefs must wow the judges with their Signature Dishes to earn a quarter-final place.

programme.desc: South West London - In South West London Justin plans to restore a neo-Gothic cemetery keeper's lodge and convert its toilet block into a luxury extension complete with a moat and swimming pool. But can he keep his budget under control?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibald’s help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come / Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep17
programme.desc: Treasure of Sierra Harvey / Babies Day In - Tiny finds a map to a legendary hoard of buried toys. Lotta takes in three abandoned baby raccoons and treats them as pets.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'd - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibald’s help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berry’s family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house – or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berry’s family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house – or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi's Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi's Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, “What shall we have for our harvest breakfast?” That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. “What about something chewy” suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry – until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear – the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Olivia Ep39
programme.desc: Olivia Paints A Mural - Olivia is inspired after a visit to the museum with her family, and decides she's going to become a great painter herself. She gets right down to business, painting a portrait of Ian. When she sees a mural painting on a building wall, she wonders if she'll ever find a space big enough for her big ideas!

programme.title: Olivia Ep40
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Ducklings - After a fun day at the park, Olivia and Ian return home with some unexpected visitors – a mother duck and her ducklings! The harder Olivia and Ian try to keep he ducks a secret from Mother and Father, the more household mischief they all seem to get into.

programme.title: Olivia Ep41
programme.desc: Olivia The Pet Monitor - Olivia and Francine both volunteer to be classroom pet monitor, so the teacher, Mrs. Hogenmuller, tells them each to explain why they deserve the job. Francine initially wins over the class with the help of her charming cat, Gwendolyn, but when it's revealed that Francine is afraid of the class lizard, everyone is happy for Olivia to take over the job - especially Francine!

programme.title: Olivia Ep42
programme.desc: Olivia Plays Hotel - When school is let out early due to snow, Julian and Francine come over to Olivia's house. Olivia has the perfect game for them – Hotel! She transforms her house into a make-believe hotel. But then some strange things start to happen. Does the hotel have ghosts, or is Ian just playing tricks on them?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep37
programme.desc: Why Bees Sting - You see there was a time when Bees didn't sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep38
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga…. But as Lion so wisely points out ‘Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep39
programme.desc: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue - You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Spooky Noise - The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddy's music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Upset Animals - Something upsets all the animals at the farm at night and no one can get to sleep . Farmer Tom asks Noddy to investigate before night falls so that everyone can go to sleep properly. Using his wwwbook to gather clues and using all his investigation skills Noddy travels all over Toyland to find out what has been disturbing the animals. He works out that the new stickers that PatPat gave to the the animals are made out of glow in the dark paper. That's what's been upsetting them all! They couldn't get to sleep because it was too bright! Farmer Tom, Big Ears and Noddy remove all the stickers and everyone settles down for a good night's sleep. Well done Noddy! Shhh!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep44
programme.desc: The Undeliverables / Johnny Hawkstorm: Two Birds, One Stone - When his special package is deemed undeliverable, Archibald teams up with Mikilos and joins an elite postal unit to get the job done. / When the main attraction at a beloved amusement park goes haywire, Johnny Hawkstorm is brought in to investigate. But Johnny is slowed down when he’s assigned a rookie partner… Archibald.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs / I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep18
programme.desc: The Lice Storm / Mission Impossibow - Audrey catches lice from an Avenue kid and thinks all Avenue kids are lice-filled. Dot gets even when The Bow doesn't pick her to be on a special team.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business.
