programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep28
programme.desc: Big Busyness / Foam Party - When Leaf meets an ambitious Coffee Bean, he learns the highs and lows of business. / Everyone is mad at Rocksy so she tries to make it up to them by creating fun foam for them to play in. But when they get preoccupied and forget about Rocksy, it’s her turn to become mad at them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep81
programme.desc: Runaway Mo - Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep82
programme.desc: Stingo's Enormous Carrot - Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep83
programme.desc: Fifi's Pancake Fun - Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep41
programme.desc: What’S Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep42
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Cool? - It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Pirate Party / Dr. Abuela - When Pepito magically gifts Escarlata legs, she finally gets the chance to crash her first Larimar party! // When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Bubble Medics to the Rescue! - In Ancient Greece, Paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance! But on the way, they're pursued by a giant Cyclops! Will they help Nonny before the Cyclops catches up to them?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bay’s famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Gail Mabo Ep8
programme.desc: From Palm Island, artist Gail Mabo shares stories from her mother's Country. She reveals how her father Eddie Koiki Mabo's High Court win has shaped her life, and what it has meant being appointed the family spokesperson.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holm vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - On a quest to regain the world bantamweight title, Holly Holm will attempt to pick up her second win of 2023 at the APEX in Las Vegas when she faces another hungry contender in Brazil’s Mayra Bueno Silva on July 15. On the best run of her UFC career, Bueno Silva has won three straight, with back-to-back submissions of Stephanie Egger and Lina Lansberg putting her on the verge of entering the title race. All that’s keeping her from that coveted spot is former world champion Holm, a superstar in MMA and boxing who is coming off a big win over Yana Santos in March

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2319
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, it’s the highly anticipated return of England’s own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinal’s meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov
